column4: how do I stop ubuntu's obnoxious update window from appearing and slowing my CPU to a halt at random times?
you can stop if from popping up the window automatically by unchecking: /apps/update-notifier/auto-launch in gconf-editor; it will show an icon in the notification area instead
I'd rather it didn't even check, I prefer manual updates via apt-get update && upgrade
the current system kills my CPU on my netbook at random times :)
